Reno, NV - photo taken by Beau Rogers

Hey I'm Ali, a software developer from Reno Nevada. I use web technologies to build awesome apps and to contribute back to the opensource world, I'm a proud supporter of the my local dev community and can often be found in local meetups.

    What I've been up to:
  • working full-time as a Risk/Fraud Analyst at Blackhawk Network.
  • building an opensource web app to help identify politically exposed personel and US sanctioned individuals to prevent OFAC true matches.
  • learning new web technologies at teamtreehouse.com.
  • Volunteering and helping local non-profits with their web projects.
